rukus.text: 12|50|rajav parannu: ninnal yusuphine enre atutt keant varu. annane tanre atutt dutan vannappeal addeham (yusuph‌) parannu: ni ninre yajamananre atuttekk tiriccupeayitt svantam kaikal murippetuttiya a strikalute nilapatentanenn addehatteat ceadicc neakkuka. tirccayayum enre raksitav avarute tantrattepparri nannayi ariyunnavanakunnu

12|51|(a strikale viliccuvaruttiyitt‌) addeham (rajav‌) ceadiccu: yusuphine vasikarikkuvan ninnal sramam natattiyappeal ninnalute sthiti entayirunnu? avar parannu: allahu etra parisud'dhan! nannal yusuphinepparri deasakaramaya onnum manas'silakkiyittilla. prabhuvinre bharya parannu: ippeal satyam velippettirikkunnu. nan addehatte vasikarikkan sramikkukayanuntayat‌. tirccayayum addeham satyavanmarute kuttattil tanneyakunnu

12|52|at (nanannane parayunnat‌, addehattinre) asannid'dhyattil nan addehatte vanciccittillenn addeham ariyunnatin ventiyakunnu. vancakanmarute tantratte allahu laksyattilettikkukayilla ennatinalumakunnu

12|53|nan enre manas'sine kurrattil ninn olivakkunnilla. tirccayayum manas's duspravrttikk prerippikkunnat tanneyakunnu. enre raksitavinre karuna labhicca manas'sealike. tirccayayum enre raksitav ere pearukkunnavanum karunanidhiyumakunnu

12|54|rajav parannu: ninnal addehatte enre atutt keant varu. nan addehatte enre oru pratyekakkaranayi svikarikkunnatan‌. annane addehatteat sansariccappeal rajav parannu: tirccayayum tankal inn nam'mute atukkal sthanamullavanum visvastanumakunnu
12|55|addeham (yusuph‌) parannu: tankal enne bhumiyile khajanavukalute adhikaramelpikku. tirccayayum nan vivaramulla oru suksippukaranayirikkum

12|56|aprakaram yusuphin a bhupradesatt‌, addeham uddesikkunnitatt tamasamurappikkavunna vidham nam svadhinam nalki. nam'mute karunyam nam uddesikkunnavarkk nam anubhavippikkunnu. sad‌vrttarkkulla pratiphalam nam nastappetuttikkalayukayilla
12|57|visvasikkukayum suksmata palikkunnavarayirikkukayum ceytavarkk paraleakatte pratiphalamakunnu kututal uttamam
